info.name: bolt field (hexa patterns)
info.description: due to the mod(), special antialiasing has to be added along the /-slanted white borders (try comment 2 last lines).

renderpass.code:
#define S(v)     smoothstep( p,-p, v )                 // antialiasing
#define hue(v) ( .5 +  cos( v  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  ) )  // one from https://www.shadertoy.com/view/ll2cDc

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    mat2 M = inverse( mat2( 1,0, .5,sqrt(3.)/2. ) );   // transform matrix
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 4.* ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y,
         V = M * U,                                    // pre-hexa tilted coordinates
         I = floor(.5*V+.5);                           // hexa-tile id
    float p = 7.5/R.y;                                 // pixel size
    
    vec3 F = vec3(mod(V+1.,2.)-1., 0); F.z = -F.x-F.y; // local hexa coordinates
    vec3 A = abs(F);                                   // hexa distance to center
    
    O = .3 * hue(17.7*I.x+I.y)                         // bolt color
      +  S(length(F)-.5) * hue(I.x+11.3*I.y)           // center color
      +  S(abs(max(A.x,max(A.y,A.z))-.7)-p)            // hexa-ring
      +  S(1.-abs(F.z))                                // white star
      +  S(1.-F.x-p/2.)                                // /-borders antialiasing
      +  S(1.+F.x-p/2.);
}
